p.s: The sonnet Sonnet 65 written by William Shakespeare, who lived between 1564-1616, is one of his many well known sonnets thematizing the aspect of love.
It is a traditional 14 line ShakespearianShakespearean sonnet wich form be made up of 3 quatrains or set of 4 lines each and a concluding couplet.

The final couplet is a rhyming pair.
The sonnet uses the metre iambic pentameter.
